hiveArticle.title: #ColorChallenge - Wednesday Yellow - Yellow Window
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone</center>

### <center> My entry for today's #colorchallenge by @kalemandra</center>

<hr>

# <center>Pratap Gaurav Kendra Front Gate in Udaipur</center>
